com.linkedin.parseq

Interface ParTask<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, Promise<java.util.List<T>>, Task<java.util.List<T>>

    public interface ParTask<T>
extends Task<java.util.List<T>>
    A ParTask will execute the list of tasks in parallel and contains the result of the complete set.
    Author:
    Chi Chan (ckchan@linkedin.com)
    See Also:
    Task.par

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.linkedin.parseq.Task

        LOGGER

      java.util.List<T> getSuccessful()
      Get the list of successful values.
      java.util.List<Task<T>> getTasks()
      Return the list of tasks that were related to this task.

    • Method Detail

      • getTasks

        java.util.List<Task<T>> getTasks()
        Return the list of tasks that were related to this task.
        Returns:
        the list of tasks.

      • getSuccessful

        java.util.List<T> getSuccessful()
        Get the list of successful values. Any task failure will not be included in the list. Therefore the results ordering will not match the ordering of the tasks if any failure has occurred.
        Returns:
        The list of successful values.
